sourcesContent:
import React from "react" // Mapping of Bot classes to semanta const botTypeClasses = { Assault: "icon military", Defender: "icon shield", Support: "icon plus circle", Medic: "icon ambulance", Witch: "icon magic", Captain: "icon star" } const BotSpecs = props => { return (

Name: {props.bot.name}

Catchphrase: {props.bot.catchphrase}

Class: {props.bot.bot_class}
{props.bot.health}
{props.bot.damage}
{props.bot.armor}
) } export default BotSpecs;
